Title: Dance Dance Resolution
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Megan Amram, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Michael continues working out the kinks in his plan and Eleanor discovers a secret.
